titleStmt.title: Emancipation Proclamation Association of the City of Jacksonville roster
titleStmt.author: Emancipation Proclamation Association of the City of Jacksonville

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

objectDesc.p: This document is typed in black ink on a standard letter sized piece of paper. The top contains a letterhead and there are notes written next to many names handwritten in blue ink.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
Officers: Dr. Eartha M. M. White, President Emeritus
J. S. Genwright, President
Rev. Cyrun A. Weaver, 1st Vice Presidentઙ Day spring. B. Church- Jefferson St.
Rev. Dr. J. C. Sams, 2nd Vice Presidentઙ
Charles Simmons, Secretary Afro- Am. Life. 2nd Missionary B- King- Rd. (mother)
Mrs. Debora Norman, Asst. Secretary
Mrs. Hattie I. James, Honorary President (Joe James) X Pres. widow
Dr. James H. Lewis, Honorary President ࢎarrange through Mrs. Betch (daughter)
